meanings.definition: To visit or go back to (a place) again.
meanings.sent1: I am revisiting my favorite park this weekend.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys revisiting her childhood home during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The cat keeps revisiting the same spot in the garden for no reason.
meanings.sent4: His dreams often involve revisiting the places he has traveled to.
meanings.sent5: Revisiting the old town brought back memories of our youth.

meanings.definition: To reconsider or think about (something) again.
meanings.sent1: After some thought, I am revisiting my decision to quit my job.
meanings.sent2: He is revisiting his opinion on the matter after hearing new information.
meanings.sent3: The idea of revisiting the same movie for the third time seemed silly.
meanings.sent4: Revisiting his past mistakes made him realize how much he had grown.
meanings.sent5: Revisiting the problem from a different angle helped him find a solution.

meanings.sent1: I will be revisiting my notes before the exam tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The team is revisiting the project to make necessary improvements.
meanings.sent3: Revisiting the same book for the fifth time, she noticed new details.
meanings.sent4: The detective kept revisiting the evidence to find the missing clue.
meanings.sent5: Revisiting the painting under different lighting revealed hidden colors.
